name: Frantic Fruits
overview:
A 3 player game is the most exciting to date and incorporates unique, patented Coin Delivery System (CDS) in the firing of up to two coins at a time in an effort to win and to give a chance to play the Fruit Reels and further enhance winnings by playing the much loved 'ho-lo' feature.

Frantic Fruits is the only novelty, coin action game to incorporate simple gameplay with hi tech AWP features for the player, this surely makes it a must for arcades, bowls and family entertainment centres. Its striking artwork and CD sound package has been stunningly themed to offer the very best quality and aesthetics.

Players insert up to two coins into the CDS and launch the coins to the back of the moving belt to land on a square to play the fruit machine feature, comprising of three spinning wheels and a fourth reel allowing the player to gamble his winnings on the 'hi-lo' reel Frantic Fruits guarantees repeat play from all customers by offering a regular payout ratio and win frequency with the additional exciting elements of gameplay.
